citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
- An elderly female goat named "Wilma" has overgrown hooves and is visibly lame. She also appears to have difficulty
lying down and standing up. Wilma appears to be "knuckling" over onto the lateral aspect of her right front hoof.
Lameness and reluctance to stand or lie down are an indication of pain and possibly mechanical obstruction. Painful
conditions have a dramatic impact on the health and well being of an animal. Wilma must be seen by a licensed
veterinarian and treated appropriately
Correct by 18 July 2024
A complete routine inspection was conducted on 16 July 2024. This inspection report is limited to the Direct non-
compliance identified during that inspection. An additional inspection report will be delivered with the other issues
identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
- An elderly female goat named "Wilma" has overgrown hooves and is visibly lame. She also appears to have difficulty 
lying down and standing up. Wilma appears to be "knuckling" over onto the lateral aspect of her right front hoof. 
Lameness and reluctance to stand or lie down are an indication of pain and possibly mechanical obstruction. Painful 
conditions have a dramatic impact on the health and well being of an animal. Wilma must be seen by a licensed 
veterinarian and treated appropriately 
Correct by 18 July 2024 
 
A complete routine inspection was conducted on 16 July 2024. This inspection report is limited to the Direct non-
compliance identified during that inspection. An additional inspection report will be delivered with the other issues 
identified during this inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
